name: Filter.limit
declaration: def Filter.limit {α : Type u_1} {β : Type u_2} [TopologicalSpace β] [Nonempty β] (l : Filter α) (f : α → β) : β

name: Filter.limit_of_const
declaration: theorem Filter.limit_of_const {α : Type u_1} {β : Type u_2} [TopologicalSpace β] [Nonempty β] (l : Filter α) (b : β) : (Filter.limit l fun x => b) = b

name: Filter.limit_of_continuous
declaration: theorem Filter.limit_of_continuous {α : Type u_1} {β : Type u_2} [TopologicalSpace α] [TopologicalSpace β] [Nonempty β] (a : α) (f : α → β) (hf : Continuous f) : Filter.limit (nhds a) f = f a
